The spirit of the dragon wells up inside you and bursts forth in a mighty roar.
You gain one additional Stunning Fist attempt per day. While using Dragon Style, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} you can expend two Stunning Fist attempts to unleash a concussive roar in a 15-foot cone. Creatures caught in the cone take your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and become shaken for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + 1/2 your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} modifier) prevents a target from being shaken.
bc4afc53-69dd-4b82-b6da-c044a96a5941:
You call upon the spirit of dragonkind, gaining greater resilience, mobility, and fierceness from the blessing of these great beings.
While using this style, you gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against sleep effects, paralysis effects, and stunning effects. Further, you can add 1.5 times your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus on the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g} for your first {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike on a given {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
7eb07838-fac8-485b-908d-9dcbc900264b:
You {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with the strength of a dragon, your telling blows striking fear into your enemies.
While using Dragon Style, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} by an additional one-half your Strength bonus, to a total of double your Strength bonus on the first attack and 1.5 times your Strength bonus on the other attacks.
When you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or a successful Stunning Fist attempt against an opponent while using this style, that opponent is also shaken for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} + your Strength bonus.
